pkgmetadata.longdescription: Applied Singular Spectrum Analysis (ASSA) // Functions to model and decompose time series into principal components using singular spectrum analysis (de Carvalho and Rua (2017) doi:10.1016/j.ijforecast.2015.09.004; de Carvalho et al (2012) doi:10.1016/j.econlet.2011.09.007).
